segments.text: Yeah , this dress is really nice ! How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That one is one hundred and fifty dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One hundred and fifty dollars ? What about this other one over here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s one hundred and forty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm ... that ’ s a bit out of my price range . Can you give me a better deal ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is an exclusive design by marco ! It ’ s a bargain at that price .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don ’ t know . I think I ’ ll shop around .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , okay , how about one hundred dollars ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s still more than I wanted to spend . What if I take both dresses ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I can give you a special discount , just because you seem like a nice person . One hundred and ninety dollars for both .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t know ... It ’ s still a bit pricey ... Thanks anyway .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: my final price ! One hundred dollars for both ! That ’ s two for the price of one . That ’ s my last offer !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! You ’ Ve got a deal !
